Name: Melody/心跳旋律
About the game: 《Melody 》is a music game based on the rhythm change to hit the key, When the note reaches the rhythm point, press the up, down, left and right keys to accurately perform the song, Each song is carefully crafted, interesting and challenging Fingertip dynamic under the melody!!! Rich collection, exquisite CG, high difficulty level!!! Realize your musical dreams!!!
